Text: CrossDailycom Membership Newsletter DanaTo reply commentphp Unsubscribe info at bottom CrossDailycom Membership Newsletter November Issue IN THIS ISSUE Log on information Graphic Membership New Bible Trivia Questions Bible Trivia Pro Greeting ECards Divided Opinion Newsletter Information LOG IN INFORMARTION Your log in info for Member Only areas of CrossDailycom Username Dana Password batfor To change your password indexphpusernameDana GRAPHIC MEMBERSHIP Over the next couple of months we will have graphics available for your enjoyment Take the opportunity now to login and fill in our survey and be the first to see our new and improved graphic section where youll soon find high resolution clipart webart photos and wallpaper BIBLE TRIVIA For all those Bible Trivia fans out there we have added new questions to challenge your knowledge of the Bible For every question you get right you have a chance to win BIBLE TRIVIA PRO CrossDailycom is getting ready to launch the new Bible Trivia Pro game Play alone or invite your friends over for hours of challenge and great fun Sign up today and be the first to get it receive a discount GREETING ECARDS CrossDailycom has ecards for evey occassion or purpose Remember this coming weekend Nov is US Thanksgiving Share and express your thanks to your family and friends by sending them an ecard today DIVIDED OPINION THE MIND OF CHRIST THE GOAL This weeks subject is Torn between Pharisees and Libertines A look at the contraversial subject of alcohol Take a moment to vote in the poll or express your opinion NEWSLETTERUNSUBSCRIBE INFORMATION As a member of CrossDailycom you receive this newsletter ONCE a month If you do not wish to receive this email the only way to get off our mailing list is to delete your free CrossDailycom membership To do this go to Delete Account after logging in below indexphpusernameDana God Bless CrossDailycom Team ChristianAdvertisingcom
